# Class ToolCallRequestData

Class for managing a collection of ToolCallData objects.

This class provides functionality to manage multiple tool call data objects as a single unit.

##### Index

### Methods

destroy fromToolCallInterfaces

## Methods

### destroy

  * destroy(): void

Destroys the ToolCallRequestData instance and frees associated resources. This method should be called when the object is no longer needed to prevent memory leaks.

#### Returns void

Overrides BaseData.destroy




### `Static`fromToolCallInterfaces

  * fromToolCallInterfaces(toolCalls: [ToolCallInterface](/interfaces/common_vector_messages.ToolCallInterface)[]): [ToolCallRequestData]()

Creates a new ToolCallRequestData instance from an array of ToolCallInterface objects.

#### Parameters

    * toolCalls: [ToolCallInterface](/interfaces/common_vector_messages.ToolCallInterface)[]

Array of tool call interfaces to wrap

#### Returns [ToolCallRequestData]()
